description: T.167 Turkey Oak - 2-3m Holistic crown reduction to suitable secondary growth points & deadwood. N.BR1 Robina - Crown lift to 2m above sheds.T.118 Indian Bean Tree - Reduce lowest eastern aspect branch by 2-3m to upright stem and lowest to west with accro support by 1m to alleviate weight.T.85, T.87, T.88, T.89, T.90 Lime - Re-pollard at previous points.
